detailsData.title: Client-Attorney Relationship
detailsData.content: Each legal expert at The Rinka Law Firm makes client concerns top priority, always setting aside time for extra consultations as requested. This consistent level of client involvement ensures a greater sense of camaraderie, leading to better results both in and out of the courtroom.

detailsData.title: Diverse Litigation Background
detailsData.content: Stephen M. Rinka’s experience draws on a litigation background that is both diverse and complex. This allows him to provide his clients with sound legal advice on a wide range of legal matters.

detailsData.title: No Fee Unless We Win
detailsData.content: We are so confident that we will secure a recovery on your behalf that we do not get paid unless we win. This ensures that our clients do not have to worry about upfront costs.

detailsData.title: Full-Time Support
detailsData.content: We pride ourselves on communication and being available for our clients when they need us most. Our vigilant efforts to keep our clients informed help them make sound, confident decisions.

address: 9440 Santa Monica Blvd., Suite 301 Beverly Hills, California 90210
subHeading: Wrongful Termination. Wage Theft. Personal Injury.
valueProp: Whether you’re struggling with being wrongfully terminated or personal injury in the aftermath of an auto accident, you need an advocate who will listen to your concerns and assist you in finding a satisfactory resolution. Your best bet lies in The Rinka Law Firm, a Southern California leader offering assistance throughout Orange County, San Bernardino County, Riverside County, Kern County and the greater Los Angeles area. Whether representing multi-million dollar operations or clients involved in smaller scale disputes, the dedicated attorneys at The Rinka Law Firm strive to provide the ultimate in legal expertise.
